forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West wind around 12 mph.

weather_report:
As dusk settles over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of clouds envelops the city, blurring the sharp lines of the skyline and giving the evening an ethereal quality. The temperature hangs comfortably in the low fifties, and a gentle westerly breeze whispers through the streets, bringing with it the familiar scent of the bay. While the sun may soon surrender to the horizon, the promise of clarity tomorrow hints at the resilience of this city nestled against the currents of the Pacific. The marine layer has claimed the coastline, softening the outlines of the Golden Gate, but not entirely obscuring its majesty.

For those contemplating a night out, a light jacket and sturdy shoes are prudent choices; warmth will be welcome as the chill deepens. It's an opportune time for a quiet stroll along the Embarcadero, perhaps pausing for a moment to watch the shimmering reflections on the water. A stop at a cozy café can provide a welcome respite, where the comforting aroma of coffee mingles with the lingering sea air, perfect for unwinding before the weekend dawns anew.
